deprecation.message: Please note, this package is obsolete and will no longer be maintained after 9/30/2026. Microsoft encourages you to upgrade to the replacement package, Azure.Messaging.ServiceBus, to continue receiving updates. Refer to the migration guide (https://aka.ms/azsdk/net/migrate/sb) for guidance on upgrading. Refer to our deprecation policy (https://aka.ms/azsdk/support-policies) for more details.

description:
Use this for Microsoft Azure Service Bus Queues, Topics, EventHub and Relay backend operations. 
        
It adds Microsoft.ServiceBus.dll along with related configuration files to your project. This library allows AMQP 1.0 to be used as one of the protocols for communication with Microsoft Azure Service Bus. 
        
For more information on Messaging features, please visit: http://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/services/service-bus/
For more information on Event Hub features, please visit: http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=403957
        
Please note that this package requires at least .Net Framework 4.6.2.
releaseNotes:
Build: 3.0.51720.1
• General: This is a major version update because of dependency change: target framework is now .Net 4.6.2 and additional package dependencies because of Role Based Access Control (RBAC) feature.
• General: commit 5c72588f: Fixed an issue in Amqp layer with how timeout value are passed internally in dispose async result which avoid possible infinite wait if the downstream waiter is awaiting on the disposition. changes are copied from: https://github.com/Azure/azure-amqp/pull/115 and https://github.com/Azure/azure-amqp/pull/123
• General: commit b0d0ef06: Improve Amqp disposition batching logic.
• General: commit 07f3bc1c: Fixed Amqp link send settle mode mismatch between incoming attach and outgoing attach.
• General: commit 672d4016: Fixed issue with Amqp where client can incorrectly receive a transfer when credit was 0 if a message is received after a drain flow.
• General: commit 0f4e34a8: Fix potential leak if Amqp client open connection and then write data but never close the connection.
• General: commit ef601a29: Added EntityMetadataUpdatedException for Amqp EntityUpdated error code.
• General: commit 3443d078: Improve reliability of AmqpMessagingFactory by doing close instead of abort session in error cases.
• General: commit 4adcec18: Fixed an issue where CommunicationException is not thrown when Amqp link is being created at the same time when Amqp session is being closed.
• General: commit 3c3daa67: Added exception translation from AuthorizationFailedException to Unauthorized Http code.
• General: commit dbf60a64: Changed interpretation of CommunicationObjectAbortedException as BadRequest in exception translations.
• General: commit 8b28c8ec: Reliability improvement: when TaskHelpers.ToAsyncResult wraps a Task which gets canceled make sure the actual error propagates to avoid hang.
• General: commit fe817f0d: Fixed an issue when under certain circumstances (OperationTimeout less than 10 seconds and in ServerBusy state) the NamespaceManager's GetAll[*] calls could sleep indefinitely.
• General: commit 7069832f: Change TrackingContext time format to use 24 hour time.
• General: commit 816b624d: Fixed an issue where opening the WcfRelay Listener (or any AmqpObject) encounters TimeoutException instead of the actual exception in certain condition.
• EventHub/Messaging: Updated the Role Based Access Control (RBAC) support in EventHub and Messaging scenario according to GA specification.
• EventHub: commit c72dea5b: Fixed typo in Amqp runtime info parameters (is_partition_empty)
• EventHub: commit f2498c0c: Improved Capture exception message for storage errors.
• EventHub: commit 27d33bff: Fixed timeout issue with NamespaceManager.CreateOrUpdateEventHubAsync() in long running time cases.
• Messaging: commit 75985e82: Fixed BrokeredMessage size calculation by avoiding negative body size.
• Messaging: commit f7effe91: Fixed transaction controller by making sure the internal link is closed when the controller is closed.
• Messaging: commit 2bdee074: Adding client side check to ensure Rename is not allowed for invalid entity name.
• Messaging: commit bee7b38d: Added new Api: NamespaceManager.GetNamespaceInfo()
• Relay: commit 5cfd6f4f: Added capability of including Allowed and Disallowed listeners.
• Relay: commit e2024505: Marked TcpRelayConnectionMode.Hybrid as obsolete.
• Relay: commit 554a1e4f: Added checks so that if the buffer is completely full, and the source stream is at its end, then don't throw insufficient memory exception.
• Relay: commit 45f2e01f: Make sure the internal MaxMessageSizeStream set stream length correctly.
• Relay: commit 85a82c4e: Added ConfigureAwait(false) to a number of internal call sites to ensure correct threading model.
• Relay: commit 7852499f: Fixed an issue where HTTPS/WebSocket zombied connection can occured in certain race pending read condition.
• Relay: commit 117773a5: Added a ResolveDnsCallback method to allow for a custom DNS cache.
• Relay: commit 1dd2f74e: Fixed WcfRelay's Amqp control connection to shutdown asynchronously.
summary: Client library for Microsoft Azure Service Bus Queues, Topics, EventHub and Relay backend operations.
title: Microsoft Azure Service Bus
